name: Mass Legal Hackers - National Day of Civic Hacking 2015
tagline: For the June 6, 2015 National Day of Civic Hacking
body:
This page is for the Massachusetts Legal Hackers projects and other activities happening June 6, 2015 as part of the National Day of Civic Hacking! 

Learn More on Our Event Wiki: https://github.com/MassachusettsLegalHackers/HackForChange2015/wiki/

Learn More About Event Projects: (links coming soon)

Participate in the Event: (registration coming soon)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
